cause.description:
I would like to raise as much money as possible to help not only save my life, but the thousands of people affected by Cystic Fibrosis....I would greatly appreciate it if you could help...Just a dollar would help take us that one step closer...So it's up to you to help save OUR LIFE...
1. Cystic Fibrosis Has a cure and hopefully we're almost there...
cause.name: Oklahomans effected by CF in everyday life...
